alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of south central Hamilton, Fulton and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower near Ephratah, or 8 miles north of Canajoharie, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gloversville, Johnstown, Canajoharie, Fort Plain, Dolgeville, St. Johnsville, Ephratah, Mayfield, Stratford, Cranberry Creek, Caroga Lake Public Campground, Northampton Beach Public Campground, Caroga Lake, Oppenheim, Berkshire, Palatine Bridge, Nelliston, Bleecker, Arietta and Ingham Mills. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer
